data.text: Edin pa yɛ sene aduhwam papa,
Ɛyɛ sɛ obi bɛkɔ ayie ase
Awerɛhoɔ yɛ sene ɔsereɛ,
Onyansafoɔ akoma wɔ ayie ase,
Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔbɛtie onyansafoɔ animka
Sɛdeɛ nkasɛɛ turituri wɔ ɛsɛn ase no
Nsisie ma onyansafoɔ dane ɔkwasea,
Asɛm awieeɛ yɛ sene ne ahyɛaseɛ,
Mma wʼakoma nsɔre ntɛm ntɛm
Ɛnka sɛ, “Adɛn enti na tete nna no yɛ sene ɛnnɛ mmerɛ yi?”
Nimdeɛ, sɛ agyapadeɛ no, yɛ adepa.
Sɛdeɛ nimdeɛ yɛ banbɔ no
Dwene deɛ Onyankopɔn ayɛ ho:
Mmere pa mu, ma wʼani nnye;
Me nkwa nna a ɛyɛ ahuhudeɛ yi mu, mahunu nneɛma mmienu:
Ɛnyɛ wo ho ɔteneneeni ntra so,
Ɛnyɛ omumuyɛfoɔ ntra so,
Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛsɔ baako mu
Nimdeɛ ma onyansafoɔ baako tumi bebree
Onipa teneneeni biara nni asase so a
Mfa deɛ nnipa ka nyinaa nyɛ asɛm,
na wonim wɔ wʼakoma sɛ,
Mede nimdeɛ asɔ yeinom nyinaa ahwɛ, na mekaa sɛ,
Sɛdeɛ nimdeɛ teɛ biara,
Afei meyɛɛ mʼadwene sɛ mɛte aseɛ,
Mahunu deɛ ɛyɛ nwono sene owuo
Ɔsɛnkafoɔ no sɛ, “Hwɛ yei ne deɛ mahwehwɛ ahunu:
Mereyɛ nhwehwɛ mu
Yei nko ara na mahunu:
